name: Fast Tech NI
tag_list: it-support, servers, pcs, network, ireland, itil, managed-services, sla, mobile, blackberry, mobile-networks
overview: FastTech NI Ltd is a provider of managed IT and communication services to the small to medium business (SMB) sector in Ireland. In addition to our primary offering we also supply and install the hardware and software that would be required by SMBs to run efficient business systems. Our service delivery is built around the IT Infrastructure Library (ITIL) standard developed by Office of Government Commerce (OGC). We believe that working to such high standards will enable FastTech NI Ltd to very quickly become the service provider of choice for companies that value their information and demand a proactive approach to the management of their IT and communications systems. Our innovative approach to the provision of managed services means that we are able to maintain systems in a proactive manner and resolve up to 90% of reported problems remotely. Using this technology also reduces costly on-site visits and minimises down time for our customers. As Microsoft Small Business Specialists we focus on the benefits of Microsoft Small Business Server. This product together with a suitable server, networking hardware, PCs and business software forms the bulk of our sales. Security is a major concern for any business using technology and our portfolio reflects the need for varied products in this area. Partnering with reputable companies such as Trend Micro for Anti Virus, Cisco for communications and Barracuda Networks for security appliances provides us with a solid and reputable product selection that gives our customers confidence with the platforms we provide.
